name: Wishlist [Notion Template]
description: Presenting the Notion Wishlist Template! This template is crafted to assist you in systematically and effectively managing all the things you want to have. This template makes sure you don't forget things you want or plan to buy later on.WISH LIST PRO IS SOMETHING YOU MUST HAVE A perfect template for organizing your listing items and free up your mental space.What's included: Minimal design with synchronization Items Button Priority List Multi Currency Quick List Access of Watch List Access of B
features: Minimal design with synchronization; Items Button; Priority List; Multi Currency; Access of Watch List; Access of Book List; Access of Bucket List (Upcoming ); 24/7 Support
